note.p: Education: Merchant Taylors' School (from 1751); scholar of St John's College, Oxford; MA (1765); BD (1774); DD (1785)

Career: Fellow of St John's College, Oxford; Proctor of the University (1773); Under-master, Merchant Taylors' School (1775); Curate, St Michael, College Hill; presented to St Sepulchre, London by his college (1784)
Notes: Possible birth date of 11 November 1743. Bulloch gives date of entering school as 1752; this has been corrected in pencil vide Register of Merchant Taylors' school
